function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of clarity in COVID-19 measures","Impact":"Reduced compliance with COVID-19 mitigation measures","Mitigation":"Provide clear and accessible information about COVID-19 measures","Technologies":"Communication technology for mass dissemination of information","People":"General public","Owner":"Health authorities, government"},{"Description":"Non-normative obligation to obey the law","Impact":"Decreased compliance with COVID-19 mitigation measures","Mitigation":"Promote a sense of duty and responsibility to follow the law","Technologies":"Educational campaigns and social influence strategies","People":"General public","Owner":"Community leaders, influencers"},{"Description":"Political orientation not associated with compliance","Impact":"Potential division and lack of unity in adherence to COVID-19 measures","Mitigation":"Promote a unified message of adherence to COVID-19 measures regardless of political orientation","Technologies":"Media and communication channels for spreading unified messages","People":"General public","Owner":"Public health officials, media outlets"}]}
